exceptions.tactic: intros x q p H1 H2.
intros x' q p H1 H2.
intros x' q' p H1 H2.
intros x' q' p' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable m.

In environment H1 : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p p, q, x : nat H : 2 <= x H0 : p < q Unable to unify "power ?M1744 ?M1746 <= power ?M1745 ?M1746" with "S (msum Init.Nat.mul 1 p (fun _ : nat => x)) <= msum Init.Nat.mul 1 q (fun _ : nat => x)".

In environment H3 : forall p q x : nat, 1 <= x -> p <= q -> power p x <= power q x H2 : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p p, q, x : nat H : 2 <= x H0 : p < q Unable to unify "?M2127 <= S ?M2128" with "S (msum Init.Nat.mul 1 p (fun _ : nat => x)) <= msum Init.Nat.mul 1 q (fun _ : nat => x)".
Unable to find an instance for the variable m.
Unable to find an instance for the variable m.

In environment H4 : forall p q x : nat, 1 <= x -> p <= q -> power p x <= power q x H1 : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p p, q, x : nat H : 2 <= x H0 : p < q Unable to unify "S (power ?M3272 ?M3273) <= power (S ?M3272) ?M3273" with "S (msum Init.Nat.mul 1 p (fun _ : nat => x)) <= msum Init.Nat.mul 1 q (fun _ : nat => x)".

In environment H5 : forall p q x : nat, 1 <= x -> p <= q -> power p x <= power q x H3 : forall k p : nat, 2 <= p -> power k p < power (S k) p H2 : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p p, q, x : nat H : 2 <= x H0 : p < q Unable to unify "?M3703 <= S ?M3704" with "S (msum Init.Nat.mul 1 p (fun _ : nat => x)) <= msum Init.Nat.mul 1 q (fun _ : nat => x)".

original: intros x q p H1 H2. unfold power. apply Nat.lt_le_trans. - apply power_mono_l. constructor. apply H1. apply H2. - apply power_sinc. constructor.
